main_definition: Puzzles refer to things that are difficult to understand, explain or solve; they can also describe a group of interlocking pieces that create an image when assembled.

meanings_and_examples.example: The new math concept was so complex it left many students puzzled.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A game, activity or set of objects that are assembled into a whole by solving individual pieces
meanings_and_examples.example: She spent the entire afternoon putting together her latest jigsaw puzzle.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To cause someone to think carefully and deeply about something difficult
meanings_and_examples.example: The rhetorical question posed by the speaker left everyone in the room puzzled, trying to decipher its meaning.
